```console
$ spack install visit
==> Error: An unsatisfiable variant constraint has been detected for spec:

    vtk@8.1.2%gcc@8.3.0 build_type=RelWithDebInfo ~ffmpeg~mpi+opengl2~osmesa~python~qt~xdmf arch=linux-ubuntu19.04-sandybridge

while trying to concretize the partial spec:

    visit@3.0.1%gcc@8.3.0~adios2 build_type=RelWithDebInfo +gui+hdf5+mpi+python+silo arch=linux-ubuntu19.04-sandybridge
        ^cmake@3.15.4%gcc@8.3.0~doc+ncurses+openssl+ownlibs~qt arch=linux-ubuntu19.04-sandybridge
            ^ncurses
                ^pkgconf@1.6.3%gcc@8.3.0 arch=linux-ubuntu19.04-sandybridge
            ^openssl
                ^perl@5.14.0:
                    ^gdbm
                        ^readline
                ^zlib@1.2.11%gcc@8.3.0+optimize+pic+shared arch=linux-ubuntu19.04-sandybridge

visit requires vtk variant +python, but spec asked for ~python
```
title: visit dependency issue
